Description:
As a Stock Keeper at ABANA Enterprises Group Co., you will be responsible for ensuring the efficient operation of Warehousesby managing the flow of stock and overseeing its organization. You will maintain accurate stock records and oversee stock levels to ensure they are maintained at optimal levels. The ideal candidate will be a detail-oriented individual with excellent organizational skills and the ability to work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.Position Summary/Definition:Ensuring materials/goods are managed properly on shelves by recording, verifying quantity to maintain safe storing.Verify receive items and packing slip
Examinees the goods for visual damage or missing quantity.
Ensure prior to store the items have coding.
Maintained stores shelves and racks.
Applied FIFO method within issuance transaction.
Report/Return defect items.
Assign and update the existing pin card/coding and classification.
To maintain and manage WH properly.
Perform the periodic factual count of the item stock.
Ensure that Item classification.
Perform any other related activity as assigned.Job Details
